gene.function: FUNCTION: Required for nuclear membrane integrity. Induces TOR1A and TOR1B ATPase activity and is required for their location on the nuclear membrane. Binds to A- and B-type lamins. Possible role in membrane attachment and assembly of the nuclear lamina. {ECO:0000269|PubMed:23569223}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Nucleus inner membrane {ECO:0000269|PubMed:12061773, ECO:0000269|PubMed:24275647}; Single-pass membrane protein {ECO:0000269|PubMed:12061773, ECO:0000269|PubMed:24275647}.
